A com link message is suddenly sent to Perceptor via Night Shift's remote c=
om link.

"Yo, Perceptor, it's me, Night Shift, I'm near the Ark now, but I=
 got side tracked by the Autobot, Tucson!  He's got Prime's Matrix and he's=
 not givn' it up without a fight!  Ya might wanna send some backup out here=
 if you're still game for that Matrix!"  

Over the com link, Tucson's voic=
e is heard.

"OVER MY DEAD CHASSE!"  

And then a powerful smack, as he dec=
ks Night Shift in the jaw.  Then another powerful smack which now sends Tuc=
son flying off his feet and onto his back!  

" Right back at ya pretty boy=
!"
